author: Alex O'Connor
description:
Want to go deeper into the historical Jesus? Explore courses, lectures, and guided readings from top scholars at: http://www.religiondepartment.com/historicaljesus

I'm speaking in London on the 17th of November. Tickets will first be available to Substack subscribers. Info here: https://www.leicestersquaretheatre.com/show/an-evening-with-alex-oconnor-religion-god-and-philosophy/

For early, ad-free access to videos, and to support the channel, subscribe to my Substack: https://www.alexoconnor.com

To donate to my PayPal (thank you): http://www.paypal.me/cosmicskeptic

 - VIDEO NOTES

Candida Moss is a historian of Christianity and author of The Myth of Persecution: How Early Christians Invented a Story of Martyrdom: https://amzn.to/4pZp8r0.

 - TIMESTAMPS

0:00 - Alex O'Connor Live 
0:37 – What is a Martyr?
15:01 – The Martyrdom of the Apostles
32:32 – The Persecution of Early Christians in Rome
45:36 – Ancient Evidence of Roman Treatment of Christians
1:08:44 – The Diocletian Persec
title: Did Christian Persecution Really Happen? - Candida Moss
